name: Brood (Magnus Lindh)
description:
Use A,S,D,W to fly the space ship and SHIFT to fire the cannon. 

This is a prototype of a Space Invaders game with realistic gravity.  The aim is to shoot down 10 aliens. Good luck!

The game is based on the game Alien Armada found in "Foundation Game Design with HTML5 and JavaScript" by Rex van der Spuy.
